name: DOES IT SPARK JOY? (Room 19, Agustín Otero Terlisky, Lucas Zinovoy, Juan Falcone)
name_original: DOES IT SPARK JOY? (Room 19, Agustín Otero Terlisky, Lucas Zinovoy, Juan Falcone)
description:
Grenade Grandma, Uzi Uncle, Machinegun Momma and the Twinbarrel Twins do not understand the value of their possesions. Their foolness must be stopped immediatly, and you are the only one who can do so.

Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • Left Click: Punch/Interact with Left Hand
  • Right Click: Punch/Interact with Right Hand
